string-array.name: daily_maintenance
string-array.item: Check the ignition system “batteries, plugs and ignitions”
Check cooling system “radiator and thermostat and cooling fans”
Inspect the belts and hoses “for sign of wear and tear”
Inspect tire for wear, bulges and cuts
Check the rims to make sure there are no cuts or abnormalities
Inspect the average charge of the battery
Check or fill the hydraulic tank

string-array.name: monthly_maintenance
string-array.item: Check the fuel system “coolant and oil”
Look for any indication of physical damage and abrasion

string-array.name: as_needed_maintenance
string-array.item: Look for parts that can be replaced
